channel.title: Style & Class
channel.description: A Vancouver-based event series for those who design and develop the web.

item.title: Our February Event
item.description:
Join us for an evening of 4 short talks of design storytelling. During your career you’ll experience defining moments that stand out in your memory. Sometimes these moments are funny, sometimes they make you think, and every now and then you learn a valuable lesson that informs the rest of your career. Our speakers will share some of their own defining moments and the lessons those moments can teach us.

Read More

item.title: Style & Class finally has a website?!
item.description:
The irony isn’t lost on us. After a year of great meetups about building the web as well as a full conference, that Style & Class existed as mostly a Meetup group without its own permanent home on the web.

Well, we’re finally fixing that today. We’ve been hard at work over the past month building this site. It’s about 90% of the way there,

We see this new site as a necessary first step toward a much expanded Style & Class. The organizing committee has only started discussing what comes next, so while we can’t be more than vague right now, you should expect more announcements over the coming months.

In the meantime, head on over to our Meetup page for future event details.
